text: Ne Omundu shalichinga omusiko kwo uwundi tawe, ne ulia uliyingwa okhuchinga shalichinjilwa kata hatiti tawe, kata nali omwikho wuwe. Toto ewe wikanyilisinjia balia abaritsanga Nyasaye wabu Omulesi nabo nibashiili okhumulola ne balumililanga okhulaama (iswala) ne ulia witswenula yetswenulilanga omwoyo kukwe omwene , ne amakalushilo kali khu Nyasaye
